inclusion.criterion: on variceal screening EGD, and no prior history of GI bleeding
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: screening EGD to look for varices. Varices will be graded by the 2-group classification system of small and large.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients on beta blockers or nitrates for any underlying condition
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 37-year-old woman who came to the clinic for a routine Pap smear. She has stage 1B cervical cancer and tested positive for HPV 16.
